Overview   Package  Class  Use  Tree  Deprecated  Index  Help 
 PREV PACKAGE   NEXT PACKAGE FRAMES    NO FRAMES    

Package de.eckhartarnold.client

Interface Summary
AttachmentListener Listener for the "attachment" events onLoad, onUnload.
Filmstrip.IPickImage An interface that encapsulates a callback method which is called when the user clicks on an image of the film strip.
GalleryListener The Listener interfaces for events of the Gallery object.
I18NConstants Class I18NConstants and defines some string constants for the user interface that ought to be language dependent.
ImageCollectionInfo The interface ImageCollectionInfo is for querying the configuration data of the photo album.
ImageCollectionReader.ICallback This interface defines a call back function that is called with the ImageCollectionReader object as parameter.
ImageCollectionReader.IMessage This interface defines a call back that receives a string message.
ImagePanel.DisplayListener Interface for event listeners of ImagePanel.
PickImageHandler Handler for pick image events that are emitted by gallery objects.
ResizeListener Interface to be implemented by widgets that will be informed if their parent widget has been resized.
SlideshowListener Interface for event listeners of class Slideshow.
SourcesAttachmentEvents Indicates that a widget allows adding attachment listeners.
StartSlideshowHandler Handler for the start slideshow event that is emitted by gallery objects
 

Class Summary
Caption Displays the image caption of the currently displayed slide of a Slideshow.
CaptionOverlay Encapsulates a caption in a transparent pop-up window over the image panel.
Compatibility Compatibility layer to evade a bug or feature (?)
ControlPanel The control panel of the slide show.
ControlPanelOverlay Puts a ControlPanel in a popup window.
Debugger A very simple "printf"-type debugger.
Filmstrip Displays a row of thumbnail images as if on a film strip.
FullScreenLayout Implements a "full screen" layout for the slide show.
Gallery Implements the full gallery widget.
GalleryBase  
GalleryPresentation Ties together the gallery and the slide show.
GalleryWidget presents the user with a table of thumbnail images that can be clicked by the user.
GWTPhotoAlbum Main class of GWTPhotoAlbum and entry point for the online photo album.
HTMLLayout Class HTMLLayout allows to code the layout of the image panel, control panel and caption in HTML.
I18N Contains an instance of class I18NConstans with the translations of all string constants that GWTPhotoAlbum uses.
ImageCollectionReader Reads the information about the image collection from a number of .json files.
ImageCollectionReader.MessageDialog This is a helper class that allows displaying an error message in a dialog so that the user can be notified of any error that occurred during reading the configuration data from the .json files.
ImagePanel Displays a photo on an absolute panel.
Layout Abstract base class for all layout classes for the slide show.
MovablePopupPanel Defines a movable "pop up" panel.
ProgressBar A progress bar widget.
Slideshow Plays a slide show on an ImagePanel.
SlideshowPresentation A simpler version of class GalleryPresentation which only "presents" the slide show an omits the gallery page.
StatusTag This class gives access to the status tag of the main html page.
Thumbnails Administers a collection of thumbnail images.
TiledLayout Defines a "tiled" layout.
Tooltip A "tool tip" widget.
